HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Balíkovna na adresu: 99 Kč
GLS: 119 Kč
Free shipping for orders over 1 800 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing:
Balík do Balíkovny: 89 Kč
Výdejní místo - Zásilkovna.cz: 99 Kč
Free shipping for orders over 1 800 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing:
Balík do Balíkovny (including AlzaBox): 89 Kč
Zásilkovna (including Z-Box): 99 Kč
Free shipping for orders over 1 800 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Blancheporte.cz offers Home Delivery and delivery to Parcel Shops/Lockers. PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by Balíkovna (Česká pošta) and GLS. Pickup points are operated by Balíkovna and Zásilkovna, which includes AlzaBox and Z-Box lockers. PRICING: Home delivery costs 99 Kč (Balíkovna) or 119 Kč (GLS). Parcel shop/locker delivery costs 89 Kč (Balíkovna) or 99 Kč (Zásilkovna). Free shipping is available on all orders over 1 800 Kč. Cash on delivery (COD) has a surcharge of 39 Kč. RESTRICTIONS: No information is provided on delivery timeframes, express delivery, weekend delivery, or shipping of bulky items. NOTABLE FEATURES: A clear free shipping threshold of 1 800 Kč applies to all delivery methods. The website claims a network of over 9000 pickup points. Multiple modern payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay are available at no extra cost. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is consolidated in a clear, easily accessible pop-up window. The costs and providers for each option are straightforward. However, the information lacks key details such as estimated delivery times, which is a significant omission for customers.
